STORY: Any sort of thing can burn in the fire.
At the year-end, everything seems to come to a stop. However, there's still enough time for a little march to celebrate.
After sticking a fishhook in your eye, the yakuza boss probably has little more to do to convince you to move to a different prefecture.

There are a bunch of HORSE CHESTNUT TREES on top of this CLIFF above the beach. Chestnuts keep rolling off the cliff and falling on people's heads. So far TEN THOUSAND people have been killed by falling chestnuts and the Japanese government still ain't did shit about it.
